item.title: Trump deflects Jeffrey Epstein questions as Ghislaine Maxwell sits for second DOJ interview
item.description: President Donald Trump is dealing with a weeks-long backlash over the DOJ's decision not to release documents related to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: What Europe's response to a no-deal with Trump could look like
item.description: Uncertainty remains about if and when a trade agreement between the EU and U.S. could be struck.

item.title: Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell will meet with DOJ official for second day

item.title: Trump spars with Powell over renovation costs during Fed visit, but backs off firing threats
item.description: Trump has previously signaled he was considering whether to fire Powell, though it is unclear if he has the legal authority to do so.
